import React, {useState} from 'react' import ReactCountryFlag from "react-country-flag" import { GiHamburgerMenu } from "@react-icons/all-files/gi/GiHamburgerMenu"; import i18next from 'i18next'; import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next' import Logo from '../../Illustration/logo-torreko.png' import './Navigation.css' const Navigation = () => { //Module de traduction const { t, i18n } = useTranslation(); //Element de la bar de menu const MenuValues = [ { id: 1, text: t('navigation.home') }, { id: 2, text: "LI-2" }, { id: 3, text: "LI-3" }, { id: 4, text: "LI-4" } ]; //Afficher la class active sur le menu const [activeId, setActiveId] = useState(1); return(
    {MenuValues.map((val) => (
  • setActiveId(val.id)}> {val.text}
    • ))}
i18next.changeLanguage('fr')} /> i18next.changeLanguage('us')} /> i18next.changeLanguage('jp')} />
) } export default Navigation;
